name: Antiphonal
description: Antiphonal; Master of Gerona (Italian, active about 1300); Bologna, Emilia-Romagna, Italy; late 13th century; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment bound between original wood boards covered with black-stained sheepskin, rebacked; Leaf: 58.3 × 40.2 cm (22 15/16 × 15 13/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig VI 6; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Antiphonal
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment bound between original wood boards covered with black-stained sheepskin, rebacked
